name: Far East of Eden Ziria: Harukanaru Jipang
summary: An Xbox 360 remake Tengai Makyou: Ziria – Haruka naru Jipang was released in 2006. Gaijinworks was working on an English localization of the remake at some point, but had to cancel the project due to being unable to get past Microsoft's publishing minimums.
